Use Case: Educators

Neatline for:

  • Setting up a Neatline exhibit for a class as a reference and/or teaching tool.
  • Setting up an Omeka site with Neatline plugins for use for student projects.

See Related: Use Case: Students

See other work by Educators:

  • Fifteenth-Century Italian Art
  • On Haj with Ibn Jubayr: Reconstructing the 12th Century Mediterranean
  • Black Liberation 1969 Archive

Steps for getting started:

Neatline is a project of the Scholars' Lab at the University of Virginia Library. It has benefited from the generous support of the UVa Library, the National Endowment for the Humanities, the Institute of Museum and Library Services, and the Library of Congress.
